title: Buff Vayne.
body: If you're not going to nerf her, at least buff her to pre-rework Kassadin level so I never have to see her past the ban phase again.

replies.body: Yeah I agree. Let's also buff her range to 700 because she needs to have a safer laning phase. Condemn isn't enough. plz

> [{quoted}](name=metaworldpeace10,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hW1VlJF4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-09-08T18:15:43.830+0000)
>
> Yeah I agree. Let's also buff her range to 700 because she needs to have a safer laning phase. Condemn isn't enough. plz

How is she supposed to be able to trade with Caitlyn in lane if Caitlyn can poke her?

>
> How is she supposed to be able to trade with Caitlyn in lane if Caitlyn can poke her?

your right we also need to have her outrange Janna tornado because it makes her early game to weak so lets give it 1100 range
Riot already beat you. They nerfed Janna's range.

> [{quoted}](name=InsertANameHere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hW1VlJF4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-09-08T18:23:00.447+0000)
>
> How is she supposed to be able to trade with Caitlyn in lane if Caitlyn can poke her?

Fuck you're right, better buff it up to 800 just to be safe. We can't have Caitlyn auto-attacking our precious Vayne now can we?
When Caitlyn steps closer to you, play safe and tumble away! :D Just farm, farm, farm. Vayne is more late game anyways.
i fine her laning fine if u hav a trusty blitz, tons of double kills 4 u.
You mean double kills for blitz, right?

Sad thing is people just didn't know how to handle pre-rework Kassadin. He was much like most assassins back then with silences except when they took it away he was pretty damn well balanced people just didn't seem to understand you had to play a lot safer and call his mias immediately. And also not feed him.
You have no idea how strong Kass was.
People complained about gp being disabled for a week? Kass was disabled in draft pick for two YEARS.

I still find it hard to believe, thinking back to that time, that it wasn't even questioned. {{champion:38}} was insta-ban, or auto-win/loss depending on who was blue side. Even in the LCS, 14/15 times Kass decided what team would win.

And everyone complained about it, but it was just so natural that the meta was ban Kassawin. It was natural. As natural as assassin meta, bruiser meta, carry-jungle meta, people complained but it still happened.

As someone who started playing mid season 3. It got to the point where most people didn't know how to play him. Why bother in blind since he was always gone in draft.  I didn't know why he was permaban, but I'll be dammed if i let him through

> [{quoted}](name=Tails Doll,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hW1VlJF4,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-09-08T18:27:27.959+0000)
>
> You have no idea how strong Kass was.

Well, considering I have been playing since season 1, I think I have a bit of knowledge about pre-rework Kassadin.
he wasn't talking to you lol

Give her permastealth on Q; after she ults, she gets bonus true dmg on basic attacks; reduce cd of Q;  + free armor pen on W (many Vaynes don't buy Last Whisper at all - BT is better, right, they need a little help).
also make her w always true damage the person on the enemy team with the most kills.
{{champion:67}} JUSTICE!!!
i like it bc we could have a garen vs vayne 1v1 epic passives{{item:3067}} {{item:3067}}

8% max hp true dmg 1st AA
16% 2nd
32% 3rd

Cuz we love our 3 AA's

No. This:

Max hp true dmg
15% 1st
35% 2nd
50% 3rd

1st: 15% max hp true damage
2nd: 45%
3rd: 135%

Make it like Morde :D

I thought it was already like this though

10% 1st AA

10% 2nd AA

80% 3rd AA

This is obviously much more balanced and will provide counterplay to Vayne's W, all you have to do is not get hit the 3rd time.

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

yes shes slow as heck with her rick roll on a 2second cooldown and a race car passive that uses a super booster when ulting

lets not forget that almost nobody builds BOTRK on her so shes even slower

> [{quoted}](name=AquariusGine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hW1VlJF4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-08T17:54:21.421+0000)

> 16% 2nd
> 32% 3rd
> 
> Cuz we love our 3 AA's

I almost took this seriously, then I saw every other comment.

What about us people who play in team builder?



_And thus, the treaty was made; all Team Builder hosts vowed from that day forward never to accept a Vayne into their room again_

Why can't we make that vow now? Please? Seriously, every goddamn Teambuilder match I play has a Vayne. On my side, she is almost always bad, on their side, she is almost always good. On the off chance she's not good on their side, if someone on their side gets fed, it stops mattering, because Vayne doesn't even need to get ahead to win a match. If she stays even in farm she'll still end up winning the game half the time.
I actually don't accept Vaynes already
Agreed. Lower cd on her E, and a true damage increase on her W would be nice.

Mana. Lower the mana on E. Use 2 or 3 Es and you're pretty much oom. The reason you never see Vayne's go oom is they save the E is for all ins. I'm rarely actually good enough to all in people, but if I could condemn a few times in laning I'd auto-win lane.

Also, let her return to stealth if she stops atttacking during her ultimate.
seems like the only thing riot knows how to do either buff to the skys or nerf to the ground and make them completely useless..

One day, they will gut her, and her fanbase will go with it until they find the next FoTM

best. post. ever.

why don't u just make her passive add AS too? like you know she get 90ms when moving towards enemies with her ult? make it so she'll get +90AS too. boom. balanced af.
oh and allow her to stack borks. so she can buy 6. or 7. yeah, add another slot. because our precious vayne needs more item slots. 
OH I KNOW. JUST LET HER STEAL HER ENEMIES ITEMS WHILE UR AT IT. your enemy bought a b.f sword? not anymore! vayne landed 3 shots that enemy - STOLEN! ha.

i do, in all honesty, love playing vayne tho LOL. I couldn't play her properly at first but then i was like oh this sucker is hugging that wall? LMFAO *E's* > PENTAKILLLLLLLLL 
the joy.
the fact that people are doing bad with vayne proves that she does have weaknesses. and I guess that she's essential if you're facing 3 tanks, else it's really difficult to take them down.... meh. who knows. LOOL
lol i love to play vayne but she doesn't need a buff, she's op already, imo

I feel like half of these comments are serious and half of them are sarcasm and yet nobody really can tell the difference. Vayne in all honestly is the strongest ADC at this given time. She dosen't need a buff. Hell buff the lower ones like lucian, corki, and twitch.
but all 3 of those are op to
Make her Condemn an On Hit Passive, along with her Silver Bolts, so that {{item:3085}}  can proc them both on all 3 targets.  Perfectly balanced.
